action_content:
if event_data['command'] == 'NOTICE':
    nick = event_data['prefix'].split('!')[0]
    target = event_data['params_list'][0]
    message = event_data['trailing']
    client.add_message(f"-{nick}- {message}", "system", context_name=target)

if event_data['command'] == 'JOIN':
    nick = event_data['prefix'].split('!')[0]
    channel = event_data['params_list'][0]
    client.add_message(f"{nick} joined {channel}", "join_part", context_name=channel)

if event_data['command'] == 'PART':
    nick = event_data['prefix'].split('!')[0]
    channel = event_data['params_list'][0]
    reason = event_data['trailing'] if event_data['trailing'] else ""
    client.add_message(f"{nick} left {channel}{' (' + reason + ')' if reason else ''}", "join_part", context_name=channel)
